panels.description: The percentage of CPU time spent processing user-level code, calculated over the last minute.

targets.expr:
(
  sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="system", job="node_exporter", instance=~"nas.*"}[1m0s])) +
  sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="user", job="node_exporter", instance=~"nas.*"}[1m0s]))
) * 100 / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job="node_exporter", instance=~"nas.*"}[1m0s]))

panels.title: CPU Activity

panels.description: Reserved memory, most recently pulled results.
panels.title: RAM Utilisation

panels.description: Current free and used space on Volume 1.
panels.title: Volume 1 Storage

panels.description: The percentage of time spent on disk IO, calculated over the last minute.
panels.title: System Disk Activity

targets.expr: sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="system", job="node_exporter", instance=~"nas.*"}[5m])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job="node_exporter", instance=~"nas.*"}[5m])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode=~".*irq", job="node_exporter", instance=~"nas.*"}[5m])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job="node_exporter", instance=~"nas.*"}[5m])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode!='idle',mode!='system',mode!='iowait',mode!='irq',mode!='softirq', job="node_exporter", instance=~"nas.*"}[5m])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job="node_exporter", instance=~"nas.*"}[5m])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="iowait", job="node_exporter", instance=~"nas.*"}[5m])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job="node_exporter", instance=~"nas.*"}[5m])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="idle", job="node_exporter", instance=~"nas.*"}[5m])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job="node_exporter", instance=~"nas.*"}[5m])))
